name: A lot of Fries
description:
Fries. What else can I say?

This game was made during quarantine jam to support the Italian Hospitals. You will find a donate link inside the game.

Features

 A great tool to test your keyboard.

 A funny way to learn facts about the holy potato

 An all around europe team (romania, spain, france)

 You get to make fries

Credits

  • Art by Alexandra Soporan
  • Music and Sound by  José Ramón "Bibiki" García
  • Code and Design by Benjamin "Yuzuquat" Robert
